channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Has The Pitt season 2 episode 1 already let slip its biggest mystery yet? I’m convinced the answer is right under our noses
item.description: I'm beside myself that The Pitt season 2 is back with episode 1, and I'm convinced I've already cracked one of the HBO Max show's biggest new mysteries.

item.title: Amazon’s AI is shopping on your behalf where it's not supposed to — and retailers aren’t happy
item.description: Amazon’s AI-powered Buy for Me service is stirring controversy by placing orders from retailers who say they never agreed to be part of the program

item.title: Dreame is a victim of its own robovac success – the new X60 Max Ultra looks amazing, but I'm struggling to get excited
item.description: Features include a super-slim build and a dock that boils the mop pads clean.

item.title: Xbox’s Towerborne is switching from a free-to-play game to a paid one
item.description: Towerborne, a side-scrolling action RPG published by Xbox Game Studios that has been available in early access, will officially launch on February 26th. But instead of launching as a free-to-play, always-on online game as originally planned, Towerborne is instead going to be a paid game that you can play offline. "You will own the complete […]

item.title: What is the release date for Landman season 2 episode 9 on Paramount+?
item.description: If episode 8 was the calm before the storm, I'm almost dreading what's coming next. But when is Landman season 2 episode 9 on Paramount+?

item.title: CES 2026: Everything revealed, from Nvidia’s debuts to AMD’s new chips to Razer’s AI oddities
item.description: CES 2026 is in full swing in Las Vegas, with the show floor open to the public after a packed couple of days occupied by press conferences from the likes of Nvidia, Sony, and AMD and previews from Sunday’s Unveiled event.

item.title: R95H et R85H, les deux séries de TV Micro RGB de Samsung de 55 jusqu’à 130 pouces
item.description: Lors du salon CES 2026 à Las Vegas, Samsung a dévoilé deux nouvelles séries de téléviseurs utilisant la technologie de rétroéclairage Micro RGB. Il s’agit des modèles R85H et R95H qui vont de 55 jusqu’à 130 pouces. En voici tous les détails.

item.title: Its playoffs time — how to watch every NFL game this postseason
item.description: The NFL postseason 2026 is here and we've got all of the streaming details you need to watch every game and every round live.
